climbs.name: Smiling Simian
climbs.fa: Greg Schaffer, Ralph Foster and Jeff Schaffer 12/1967

content.description: This climbs the steep north face on the left side and is protected by two closely spaced bolts at the crux.  It's a bit of a run up to and past the bolts, but the climbing is on good rock.
content.protection: Two protection bolts to a two bolt anchor with hardware for rappel.
content.location: This route is identified by two closely spaced bolts near the left side of the boulder.

climbs.name: Easy Route
climbs.fa: Andrew Emery and Steve Roper December 11, 1965

content.description: This was the first route on the formation and was done 4th class by Emery and Roper.  There is no protection, but the climbing is lower angle.  Either downclimb or rappel from bolts and hardware.
content.protection: No protection on the climb, but there is an anchor for rappel on top.
content.location: Find the low angle face around the left edge of the north face of this boulder.
